kapilawasthuwa, wesaliya, kusinarawa saha pawa, kesapuththa, pippali wanaya.pilithura:kapila wasthu shakyawaru, wesaliya lichchawi, kusinara saha pawa malla rajawaru, kesapuththa kalamawaru, pippali wanaya mauryawaru,prashnaya:brahmana dharmayata patahaniwa giya aagamika kotas da buddhakalina bharathaya, me sampradaya siyalla ekkota shramana yana podu namayakin handunwa atha.
ee sadaha hethuwa pahadili natha.

mage mole monatharam ara hine siriyas aragena thibunada kiwwoth dan man wate inna anith okkoma bayawela indiddi man witharak sathuten innawa.mokada mata hithennema dan me siddhawechcha aruma puduma de nisa ara hine prathipalaya wenas wenna athi kiyala (hari hari mano widyagnyayek nam kiyayi ithin ee api ape manasata biyak athi wunama mangaharawa ganima sandaha ganna upakrama kiyala).
''adhikaranayata danum dila thiyena widihata saukhya amathyanshaya thamayi me yojanawa karala thiyenne.
walan kadayata pana gath janaprawadagatha haraka men dakina dakina sama thanakatama anima deshapalanaya karagena athi janadhipathi sirisena da gotabhayage aniyam udawkaruwaku bawata pathwa thibe.
sowiyat rajayen dena me aluth pasala wiwrutha kirimata, eda siyalu badhaka madhyaye gamata pamini palamu guruwarayata aaradhana kirimata kisiwekuta mathak noweyi.
man hamudapathi, ithin wadiyen kalaguna salakanna oona senadhinayaka thumatane."
